mapper.select: SELECT s_billing_subscription.id, s_billing_subscription.company, s_billing_subscription.email, s_billing_subscription.billingId, s_billing_subscription.name, s_billing_subscription.subReference, s_billing_subscription.accountId, s_billing_subscription.createdTime, s_billing_subscription.status, s_billing_subscription.country, s_billing_subscription.city, s_billing_subscription.address, s_billing_subscription.state, s_billing_subscription.zipcode, s_billing_subscription.phone, s_billing_subscription.contactName, s_billing_subscription.subscriptionCustomerUrl, (SELECT MAX(expiredDate) FROM s_billing_subscription_history WHERE s_billing_subscription_history.subscriptionId = s_billing_subscription.id) AS expireDate, s_billing_plan.billingType AS plan_billingType, s_billing_plan.numUsers AS plan_numUsers, s_billing_plan.volume AS plan_volume, s_billing_plan.numProjects AS plan_numProjects, s_billing_plan.pricing AS plan_pricing, s_billing_plan.description AS plan_description, s_billing_plan.shoppingUrl AS plan_shoppingUrl, s_billing_plan.productPath AS plan_productPath FROM s_billing_subscription INNER JOIN s_billing_plan ON (s_billing_plan.id = s_billing_subscription.billingId) LIMIT 1
